entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
